item.title: Code Wrapper on Shoes v0.4a
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
CWoS does not work on Ubuntu 7.10 for assigning to self.clipboard.
Umm.... sad. :(
So, I tried to add a new link to open dialog window for showing clipboard data. You can copy the formatted data from the extra window. Uploaded v0.4a intothe github repo.
# GC_CWoS_snapshot_081223.png

This idea was born from the participants' good suggestion in the Shoes programming course. Cool!

ashbb
